name: Molydeus
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned

traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If the molydeus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Magic Resistance: The molydeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Magic Weapons: The molydeus's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.Multiattack: The molydeus makes three attacks: one with its weapon, one with its wolf bite, and one with its snakebite.
actions.Demonic Weapon: Melee Weapon Attack: +16+1d14 + 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) slashing damage. If the target has at least one head and the molydeus rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated and dies if it can't survive without that head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has legendary actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra 6d8 slashing damage from the hit.
actions.Wolf Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +16+1d14 + 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) piercing damage.
actions.Snakebite: Melee Weapon Attack: +16+1d14 + 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (1d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 22+1d14 + 15 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target transforms into a manes if this reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This transformation can be ended only by a wish spell.

options.Attack: The molydeus makes one attack, either with its demonic weapon or with its snakebite.
options.Move: The molydeus moves without provoking opportunity attacks.
options.Cast a Spell: The molydeus casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait.
